com.efnilite.towerdefence.tower

Class Tower

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.efnilite.towerdefence.tower.Tower
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    SimpleTower

    public abstract class Tower
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract class used for creating Towers

    • Field Detail

      • id

        protected final int id
        The Tower id (e.g. 2, 65, 234) Based on the amount of Towers in the game, so if there are 20 Towers and this Tower gets placed the id will be 21

      • level

        protected int level
        The Tower level

      • range

        protected int range
        The range of the tower

        The configuration

      • player

        The player that owns this Tower

      • towerCenter

        protected org.bukkit.Location towerCenter
        The center Location of the tower (useful for getting players/mobs in range)

      • close

        public static void close()
        Closes the register

      • register

        @API
public static void register(java.lang.Class<? extends Tower> cls,
                                  java.lang.String name)
        Registers a Tower
        Parameters:
        cls - The Tower class
        name - The id of the Tower Should be the name of the Tower (e.g. Tower name: "Pink Tower", id should be "pink")

      • placed

        public abstract void placed(java.util.List<TowerPlayer> players)
        Gets called when the Tower is placed
        Parameters:
        players - The players that were teleported so the Tower could be built

      • fire

        public abstract void fire(org.bukkit.Location shoot,
                          EntityList targetsInRange,
                          double damage)
        Gets called when the Tower should fire (based on rate in config files)
        Parameters:
        shoot - The location where to shoot from (based on config)
        targetsInRange - The entities in range
        damage - The damage specified in the config

      • upgrade

        public abstract void upgrade(int oldLevel)
        Gets called when the Tower gets upgraded
        Parameters:
        oldLevel - The level the Tower was at

      • sell

        public abstract void sell(int oldLevel)
        Gets called when the Tower is sold by the player

        If you have any delayed Runnables that interact with this class, it will result in an error. After this method is called this class gets deleted to save memory.

        Parameters:
        oldLevel - The level the Tower was at

      • kill

        public abstract void kill(org.bukkit.entity.LivingEntity killed)
        Gets called when the Tower kills a Troop (should be used for giving coins, exp, etc.)
        Parameters:
        killed - The EntityType that was killed
